oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Funeral notice of Virginia Lytle Andrews

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small notice inviting the community to attend the funeral of Virginia Lytle Andrews of Murfreesboro, Tennessee. The notice is bordered in black.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Invitations; Funeral rites & ceremonies
Invitation cards
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Virginia Lytle Andrews was the wife of James H. Andrews of Murfreesboro. The funeral was held at the Methodist church and burial was at the residence.
